name: Felix The Cat in Trouble At The Circus
name_original: Felix The Cat in Trouble At The Circus
description:
This is a 3D Platformer featuring Felix The Cat. In this game. you play as Felix The Cat who has been tasked with retrieving the run away mice who have escaped the circus. It's up to you to gather all the mice and help the circus.

*Playable only with mouse and keyboard*

This game was made in 15 Days (June 17th - July 3rd) in Unity Engine for the Together Game Jam

Thanks for playing
